faq.a1: A cryptocurrency exchange is an online trading platform that allows users to buy, sell, and exchange various cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, ETH, Solana, USDT, and many others.
faq.q2: How many types of cryptocurrency exchanges are there?
faq.a2:
There are two popular types of cryptocurrency exchanges:

Centralized Exchange (CEX): Acts as an intermediary, connecting buyers and sellers. CEXs typically have high liquidity, user-friendly interfaces, and are often chosen by beginners. ONUS is one of the reputable CEXs in Vietnam.

Decentralized Exchange (DEX): Trades occur directly between users without intermediaries. DEXs offer higher security but have more complex interfaces and lower liquidity compared to CEXs.
faq.q3: Is the ONUS cryptocurrency trading app reputable?
faq.a3: ONUS is one of the reputable cryptocurrency trading apps in Vietnam, with nearly 7 million trusted users and a 4.7-star rating on the App Store and Google Play. It is licensed to operate in five countries and has high liquidity. Combined with advanced security technologies from CyStack, WhiteHub, Nexo, etc., it ensures absolute safety with convenient two-layer security.
faq.q4: Is the ONUS cryptocurrency trading app suitable for beginners?
faq.a4: The ONUS cryptocurrency trading app is suitable for all users, especially beginners, with advantages such as: a simple interface, diverse automatic investment support, easy deposits and withdrawals in VND via bank accounts/credit cards; reputable and safe with a 24/7 support community; earning overnight interest of up to 10%; buying and selling Bitcoin and over 600 other cryptocurrencies; and a bonus of 270,000 VND for new users to start investing. Download the ONUS app right here.
faq.q5: How to register an account on the ONUS cryptocurrency trading app?
faq.a5:
To register an account on the ONUS cryptocurrency trading app, you need to follow these three steps:

Download the ONUS app from the App Store or Google Play, register an account using your phone number/email.

Complete basic verification to unlock features.

Complete advanced verification by purchasing VNDC (minimum 50,000 VND) or depositing 10 USDT to become a "Trusted Customer" and access all features.

See more detailed instructions here.
faq.q6: What are the transaction fees on the ONUS cryptocurrency trading app?
faq.a6: The spot trading fee is only 0.1% for all assets, including Bitcoin (BTC), ETH, USDT, and over 600 other cryptocurrencies, while the lowest future fees in the market are 0.02% for Maker and 0.04% for Taker.
faq.q7: Which cryptocurrencies does the ONUS app support for trading?
faq.a7: ONUS supports trading Bitcoin and over 600 types of Altcoins across various sectors such as Top 100 coins, Stablecoins, DeFi, Web3, NFTs, Blockchain, BRC20, CEX, Metaverse, POW, POS, AI coins, etc.
faq.q8: Is the customer support of the ONUS crypto app good?
faq.a8: ONUS provides multi-channel customer support with an enthusiastic community: Website, Facebook Fanpage, Facebook Group, Telegram, Twitter, YouTube, and Support Center: https://support.goonus.io.
